description:
Nikolas Boltik was a http://anidb.net/t2322 [Phezzani] politician and diplomat who first served as the secretary of http://anidb.net/ch204 [Adrian Rubinsky] before being transferred to Odin as http://anidb.net/ch6233 [Phezzan]`s ambassador to the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. He ended up colluding with http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] to help him conquer Phezzan and the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance], subsequently becoming the governor-general of Phezzan under the New Galactic Empire.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Nikolas Boltik
